title: How does technology help in communication? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology comes in handy in facilitating smooth communication among indi- viduals or businesses; as it provides alternatives that lead to effective communication. Through smartphones and comput- ers, people can pass messages and receive feedbacks through calls, messages and emails respectively.

To answer this question I will need tons of pages. Quora won't have that much space available. Communication is not a small term, while technology is not a simple term either. Your question more like “Write about the earth”. Now tell me how many pages will you need to answer this question?
